title: Talking it out with Derek Carr
itunes:title: Talking it out with Derek Carr
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling, & Gregg Rosenthal – recap all the latest news from around the NFL including the death of Aaron Hernandez and the Patriots' visit to the White House. Then the heroes welcome NFL draft analyst Lance Zierlein to break down some of the biggest storylines as we head into draft week. And finally…NFL Network’s David Carr and Raiders quarterback Derek Carr join the show as we attempt to broker a peace between Derek, Dan and Gregg. (Check out the video here: http://www.nfl.com/videos/around-the-nfl/0ap3000000801164/ATN-Brokering-peace-with-Derek-Carr)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
